mapper.select:
SELECT A.ObjectID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl A INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user U ON (A.SubjectCode = U.UserCode ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.`View` = '_' AND A.ObjectType = 'FD' AND A.SubjectCode = #{userCode} AND A.SubjectType = 'UR' UNION SELECT A.ObjectID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_acl A INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group G ON ( A.SubjectCode = G.GroupCode ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.`View` = '_' AND A.ObjectType = 'FD' AND A.SubjectType != 'UR' AND A.SubjectCode IN
#{item}

SELECT SOF.FolderID AS FolderID , SOF.MemberOf AS MemberOf , SOF.FolderType AS itemType , SOF.FolderType , SOF.FolderPath , SOF.MenuID , (CONCAT('board_',SOF.FolderType)) AS type , IFNULL(Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOF.MultiDisplayName), SOF.DisplayName ) AS FolderName , SOF.MemberOf , SOF.DisplayName AS DisplayName , SOF.SortPath , (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM sys_object_folder AS self WHERE self.MemberOf=sof.FolderID AND self.IsUse = 'Y' AND self.DeleteDate IS NULL) AS hasChild , (IF(INSTR(SOF.OwnerCode, #{userCode})>0,'Y','N')) AS OwnerFlag , IFNULL(SOF.IsMobileSupport, 'N') AS IsMobileSupport , IFNULL(SOF.Reserved4,'N') IsContents FROM sys_object_folder AS SOF LEFT JOIN sys_object_domain AS SOD ON SOF.DomainID = SOD.DomainID
LEFT JOIN board_config AS BC ON BC.FolderID = SOF.FolderID
WHERE 1=1
AND SOF.MenuID = #{menuID}
AND SOF.MenuID = #{menuID}
AND (SOF.MenuID = #{menuID} OR SOF.DomainID = 0)
AND SOF.ObjectType = 'Community'
AND SOF.ObjectType = #{bizSection}
AND (SOF.FolderType = 'Root' OR SOF.FolderPath REGEXP (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(FolderID SEPARATOR ';|') FROM sys_object_folder WHERE FolderType = 'Root'))
AND (SOF.FolderType = 'DocRoot' OR SOF.FolderPath REGEXP (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(FolderID SEPARATOR ';|') FROM sys_object_folder WHERE FolderType = 'DocRoot'))
AND (SOF.foldertype IN ('Root','Folder') OR SOF.reserved4='Y' ) AND SOF.DomainID = #{domainID}
AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND SOF.IsDisplay = 'Y'
AND SOF.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND SOF.FolderType NOT IN ('QuickComment', 'Contents')
AND SOF.IsMobileSupport = 'Y'
AND (SOF.FolderType IN ('Root', 'Folder') OR BC.UseOwnerProcess = 'N')
ORDER BY SOF.MenuID, SOF.FolderPath, SOF.SortKey ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_object_folder AS SOF INNER JOIN board_interest AS BI ON (SOF.FolderID = BI.FolderID) WHERE 1=1 AND BI.RegisterCode=#{userCode} AND SOF.IsUse='Y' AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SOF.FolderID, SOF.MultiDisplayName, Fn_FolderPathByLangGet_S(#{lang}, SOF.FolderPath) AS FolderPath, BI.RegistDate FROM sys_object_folder AS SOF INNER JOIN board_interest AS BI ON (SOF.FolderID = BI.FolderID) WHERE 1=1 AND BI.RegisterCode=#{userCode} AND SOF.IsUse='Y' AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL ) AS RESULT WHERE 1=1
MultiDisplayName FolderPath RegistDate FolderID
ASC DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT BU.UserFormID, BU.FolderID, BU.SortKey, BU.FieldType, BU.FieldSize, BU.FieldLimitCnt, BU.IsList, BU.IsOption, IFNULL(BU.IsCheckVal, 'N') AS IsCheckVal, BU.IsSearchItem, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, FieldName) AS FieldName, BU.IsLabel, BU.Description, BU.IsTooltip, BU.DefVal, BU.FieldLimitMin, BU.FieldLimitMax, BU.FieldWidth, BU.FieldWidthUnit, BU.FieldRow, BU.GotoLink, BU.FieldHeight, BU.FieldHeightUnit, BU.IsTitle, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_userform_option WHERE UserFormID=BU.UserFormID AND FolderID=#{folderID}) AS OptionCnt FROM board_userform AS BU WHERE BU.FolderID=#{folderID} AND BU.DeleteDate IS NULL
AND IsSearchItem = 'Y'
AND Bu.FieldType not in ('Label','Space', 'Line', 'Button', 'Image', 'Help')
AND IsList = 'Y'
ORDER BY SortKey ASC
SELECT OptionID, UserFormID, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, OptionName) AS OptionName, OptionValue FROM board_userform_option WHERE UserFormID = #{userFormID} ORDER BY SortKey ASC

SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, IFNULL(MultiDisplayName, DisplayName)) AS DisplayName FROM sys_object_folder WHERE 1=1 AND FolderID IN
#{item}

SELECT optionValue, optionText, FolderID, FolderType, DisplayName FROM ( SELECT SOF.FolderID AS optionValue , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, IFNULL(SOF.MultiDisplayName,SOF.DisplayName)) AS optionText , SOF.FolderPath , SOF.SortKey , SOF.FolderID , SOF.FolderType , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, IFNULL(SOF.MultiDisplayName,SOF.DisplayName)) AS DisplayName FROM sys_object_folder AS SOF LEFT JOIN sys_object_domain AS SOD ON SOF.DomainID = SOD.DomainID WHERE 1=1
AND SOF.MenuID = #{communityID} AND SOF.ObjectType = 'Community'
AND (SOF.MenuID = #{menuID} OR SOF.DomainID = 0) AND SOF.ObjectType = #{bizSection}
AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.FolderType NOT IN ('Root', 'Folder', 'QuickComment') AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND SOF.IsDisplay = 'Y' ) AS RESULT ORDER BY
FolderID = #{folderID} DESC,
FolderPath, SortKey ASC

SELECT A.CategoryID AS optionValue ,A.FolderID ,IFNULL(A.MemberOf, 0) AS MemberOf ,(SELECT COUNT(CategoryID) FROM BOARD_CATEGORY WHERE MemberOf = A.CategoryID) AS NodeCount ,A.CategoryPath ,CONCAT (IF(MemberOf IS NULL OR MemberOf = 0 , '', '┗ '), Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, A.DisplayName)) AS optionText ,A.SortKey ,A.SortPath FROM BOARD_CATEGORY AS A WHERE A.FolderID = #{folderID} ORDER BY SortPath ASC

SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, FormName) AS optionText, BodyFormID AS optionValue FROM board_bodyform WHERE 1=1 AND folderID = #{folderID} AND IsInit = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, FormName) AS optionText, BodyFormID AS optionValue FROM board_bodyform WHERE 1=1 AND folderID = #{folderID} AND IsInit = 'N'
SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},MultiDeptName) AS optionText , DeptCode AS optionValue FROM sys_object_user_basegroup WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}
SELECT StateID AS optionValue ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, DisplayName) AS optionText FROM board_progressstate WHERE FolderID = #{folderID} ORDER BY SortKey ASC

SELECT SOF.FolderID AS FolderID ,SOF.MemberOf AS MemberOf ,SOF.FolderType AS itemType ,SOF.FolderType ,SOF.FolderPath ,SOF.MenuID ,( CONCAT('board_',SOF.FolderType) )AS type ,IFNULL(covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, SOF.MultiDisplayName), SOF.DisplayName ) AS FolderName ,SOF.MemberOf ,SOF.DisplayName AS DisplayName ,SOF.SortPath ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder AS self WHERE self.MemberOf=sof.FolderID AND self.IsUse = 'Y' AND self.DeleteDate IS NULL) AS hasChild ,(IF(INSTR(SOF.OwnerCode, #{userCode})>0,'Y','N')) AS OwnerFlag FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder AS SOF LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain AS SOD ON SOF.DomainID = SOD.DomainID WHERE (SOF.MenuID = #{menuID} OR SOF.DomainID = 0) AND SOF.ObjectType = #{bizSection} AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND SOF.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND SOF.FolderPath NOT REGEXP ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(FolderID SEPARATOR ';|') FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder WHERE (IsUse = 'N' OR IsDisplay = 'N') )
AND SOF.FolderID IN
#{item}
ORDER BY SOF.MenuID, SOF.FolderPath, SOF.SortKey ASC
SELECT IFNULL(IsMobileSupport, 'N') AS isMobileSupport FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_folder WHERE 1=1 AND FolderID = #{folderID}
